ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( Apex_Override_Validation__c ) && ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") && NOT(ISBLANK(RecurSoft__Shipping_Contact__c)) && OR( ISBLANK( RecurSoft__Shipping_Contact__r.RecurSoft__Intacct_Contact_ID__c ), RecurSoft__Shipping_Contact__r.RecurSoft__Synced_With_Intacct__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please verify that the Ship to Contact has been synced with Intacct and has an Intacct Contact ID.
